about_the_game:
Cozy Littlequarium is a relaxing game that sits at the bottom of your screen, fitting perfectly into your daily routine, whether you're working, studying, or having fun with other tasks. Have your own aquarium always available at the bottom of your screen. Take care of it at your own pace, no rush, no worries, and enjoy the company of your new little fish.

BUY AND CARE OF FISH

Purchase a wide variety of fish to populate your aquarium. From colorful tropical species to peaceful freshwater dwellers, you can add them all to your tank. But remember, they need your care! Feed them regularly and keep an eye out for any signs of illness—it's up to you to ensure they stay healthy and happy.

DECORATION & CUSTOMIZATION

In Cozy Littlequarium, your aquarium is your personal masterpiece. Choose from a variety of decorations to create the perfect underwater world, from calming stones and plants to colorful corals and unique items. You can also change the floor texture to suit your style, and even adjust the color and opacity of the water to set the mood. Whether you want a peaceful, natural look or a vibrant, magical environment, the choice is yours—design your dream aquarium and make it truly yours!

BREED FISH TO DISCOVER NEW SPECIES

Combine different fish to breed new and exciting species! As your fish reproduce, you’ll unlock a range of unique and rare breeds. Experiment with different pairings to discover and collect all the amazing species the game has to offer.

COLLECT ALL THE FISH SPECIES

Collect every fish species in the game! In Cozy Littlequarium, your journey to discover and collect fish is tracked in an interactive Compendium. This vibrant collection features all the fish species you've encountered, organized by color and type. Each new discovery is added to your Compendium, creating a beautiful, colorful record of your aquatic adventures. 

Whether you’re hunting for a specific fish or just enjoying the thrill of discovering new species, the Compendium will be your trusted guide and a rewarding reminder of your accomplishments.

ADD COZY LITTLEQUARIUM TO YOUR WISHLIST AND DIVE INTO THIS CALM ADVENTURE!

Hi, I'm Gabreu Senra, the creator and pixel artist behind Cozy Littlequarium. Developing this underwater world has been an incredible experience, and it's with great care that I share this journey with you.

If Cozy Littlequarium has caught your interest, be sure to add it to your wishlist! It's a wonderful way to support us as we continue to create and expand this relaxing universe. Your aquarium will always be at hand, ready to be cared for at your own pace, whether you're working, studying, or enjoying other activities. Watch over your fish, customize your environment, and discover new species with ease and pleasure.

Thank you for being part of this underwater adventure and for helping bring this world to life!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
